ygData.msgSnippet: You want rhyme, eh?? Well you got rhyme! ... Grimmler ducks under the blast, As he s done many times in the past. But the two lasers hit square on, And nearly

You want rhyme, eh?? Well you got rhyme!

::Grimmler::

Grimmler ducks under the blast,
As he's done many times in the past.
But the two lasers hit square on,
And nearly knock him back on his bon bon.
But the Maximal jumps to his feet,
Though that wasn't much of a feat.
He aims at Astroblast and fires a few times,
But now I'm sick of making all these rhymes.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> --- Astroblast ---
> 
> Astroblast begins laughing, "Haha, puny Autobot, you are so 
> pathetically usele---" He is cut off as a laser bolt burns into his
leg, 
> and another hit him in thr forhead, making him a little woosy for a 
> second. "Arrrghghhhh, NOW YOU PAY, MAXIMAL!" His twin chin 
> (lol rhyme) lasers fire a twice at Gimmler, and he fires his Ionic 
> displacer rifle once.
> 
> 
> 
> On 14 May 2001, at 14:10, Yanshosh@a... wrote:

> > ::Grimmler::
> >

> > 
> > "Watch out!" he exclaims, firing several laser bolts at
Astroblast.

to

firing

Displacer

Autobot!"

aparent

spot. He
